Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to innovation and quality. Given its exceptional features and benefits, we believe its true value lies well beyond $12000. Considering the unique value it would bring to your business or personal endeavors, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $15000. This is an exceptional deal, considering the market value and the unparalleled experience it promises. I look forward to your consideration and the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your life. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
